name: Baby Adult Anxiety Comedy
description: Cinematic close-up of a worried baby expressing various adult anxieties with custom response options
promptTemplate: A cinematic long take, an extreme close-up shot. The focus is on a sunlit nursery where a baby, around one year old, looks deeply sad and worried. The background features a cream-colored carpet and a baby crib, beautifully blurred to create a stunning depth of field with excellent bokeh. The camera captures a continuous action: First, the baby lifts his head, his eyes welling with tears, his expression filled with profound sorrow. He lets out a heavy, world-weary sigh, facing the camera directly. (The frame is a tight single shot on the baby; no one else appears). At this moment, a gentle, adult female voice asks from off-screen in {response_language}: '{interview_question}' Then, a black microphone enters the frame, moving into position right in front of the baby. The baby replies in a desperate, childish voice in {response_language}: '{baby_answer}' Both the interviewer and baby speak clearly in {response_language} language with appropriate accents and pronunciation.

complaint_type.label: Complaint Type
complaint_type.default: My formula money... it all got wiped out in the market!

options.value: My formula money... it all got wiped out in the market!
options.label: Stock Market Loss 📉

options.value: I need to update my LinkedIn... crawling skills aren't enough anymore!
options.label: Career Anxiety 💼

options.value: She left me for someone who can walk... I understand though.
options.label: Relationship Drama 💕

options.value: The nursery mortgage rates are killing us!
options.label: Housing Crisis 🏠

options.value: Formula prices doubled! This is worse than 2008!
options.label: Inflation Stress 🍼

options.value: My social media engagement is terrible... only family likes my posts.
options.label: Social Media Anxiety 📱

options.value: College applications start at 6 months now, I'm already behind!
options.label: Education Pressure 🎓

options.value: My sleep schedule is ruined and it's affecting my work-life balance!
options.label: Health Anxiety 🏥

options.value: They're outsourcing all the baby jobs to AI now!
options.label: AI Job Replacement 🤖

options.value: Dating apps are brutal when you're pre-verbal.
options.label: Dating Struggles 💔

options.value: My performance review is tomorrow and I can't even sit up!
options.label: Work Performance 📊

options.value: custom
options.label: Custom Q&A ✏️

interview_question.label: Custom Interview Question
interview_question.default: Sweetie, you seem so worried. What's wrong?
interview_question.description: Custom question when 'Custom Q&A' is selected. Uses default for preset options.

baby_answer.label: Custom Baby Response
baby_answer.description: Custom response when 'Custom Q&A' is selected. Max 20 words.
